alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Lincoln; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 6:24AM CDT until June 18 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Eastern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northern Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 730 AM CDT. * At 624 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Atlanta to 13 miles west of Bernice to 7 miles east of Homer, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Farmerville, Bernice, Cooley, Dubach, Marion, Junction City, Lisbon, Spearsville, Lillie, D Arbonne, Mount Zion, Oakland, Haile, Rocky Branch, Lake Clairborne, Cecil, Corinth, Unionville, Litroe and Loch Lomon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
